Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear constraints where variables are restricted to integers.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization of a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints.
Example: Minimizing cost function with nonlinear constraints.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimization of a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints.
Solvability: Convex QP is solvable in polynomial time

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimization of a convex objective function subject to convex constraints.

Name: Combinatorial Optimization
Description: Optimization problems where variables are discrete and solutions are combinations of elements.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Optimization by breaking the problem into simpler subproblems and storing solutions to avoid recomputation.

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Optimization under uncertainty where some parameters are random variables.

Name: Global Optimization
Description: Optimization where the objective function is non-convex and may have multiple local optima.
